parameter.value: Nowadays I am just a salesmen.
I can offer you musical instruments and books.
I am an elf from Ashbere. I was lucky king Arturo accepted me with wide arms, since elves from Ashbere haven't got a really good reputation.
Ashbere is the elven village north of Celeres. Its inhabitants, the dark elves, are well known to be very aggressive ones. I got tired of that attitude, so I decided to move here.
King Arturo is a very kind man, and it's no wonder he is the king of the human race.
I have recently moved to Casteldine.
Celeres is constantly under attack by the aggressive elves from Ashbere.
I have various instruments for sale. You may choose between drums, lutes, simple fanfares and lyres.
Currently I have only two books for sale. Black books and brown books.
I have always loved music, but music was not accepted in Ashbere.
You might see it as a little silly, but Penim actually means flower.
